I used this tweet as inspiration to build a shiny where users browse a set of debt contracts on a DT and select a single row. This selection feeds another DT with some related documents. Now it's easy to choose a single document to see its pdf. #RStats #EconTwitter #OpenData https://t.co/WYqxa3SMLB https://t.co/WSIaFflaIo

I'm no historian, but I believe that the rich created the idea that individuals can solve global crises solely by their own "everyday choices". For anyone else who has lived in poverty, we know that "choices" are a luxury. Only the rich would propose an idea (1/n)

Your regular reminder that there is still no national #opendata available for Public Rights of Way. That's why the information isn't readily available in the free online maps that most people use. #rightsofway #righttoroam #geospatial
